subject: Change in rating
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam

New ratings for the following Buyers were detected {{#buyers}} {{/buyers}}
Buyer Code
{{.}}
Please note that the entry is created based on information received from the Buyer and validated from the website of rating agency. You can check the same in the Buyer Seller profile screen. Regards RXIL Credit team
{{{footer}}}
